data.title: Colt Henry Lewis Obituary 2024
data.meta_description: Colt Henry Lewis was born September 4th, 1998 in Grapevine, Texas.  As a young child, his parents moved back to MN and he attended school in Fridley, MN. Throughout school Colt...
data.text:
Colt Henry Lewis was born September 4th, 1998 in Grapevine, Texas. As a young child, his parents moved back to MN and he attended school in Fridley, MN. Throughout school Colt enjoyed swimming, football, lacrosse and trap shooting team. Upon high school graduation Colt began his college career at Norwich University in Vermont, and graduated from Moorhead State in MN. Colt spent a summer in Ukraine helping those in need. Throughout his life Colt wanted to serve his country. He continued his life in North Saint Paul and went on to become a defender for our country in the US Army MN National Guard. Colt departed from this life Saturday July 20th. Preceded in death by his father, Eric Lewis. His mother, Joy Lewis, wife Milvia Esperaza Vasquez Aldana and their son, Jean Carlos David Ariat; daughter, Ashley Eloina Arita Vasquez, will miss him greatly.

For anyone who may desire to attend the visitation of Colt, my husband, it will take place on Friday, July 26th from 4:00pm to 10:00pm at Miller funeral home, 6210 Highway 65 NE, Fridley, MN 55432. Mass of Christian Burial will be held Saturday July 27th at 11am at the St Williams Church, located at 6120 5th St. NE, Fridley, MN 55432. Visitation at church 1 hour before Mass. We will have a private burial at Fort Snelling National Cemetery.

Thank you, your prayers are greatly appreciated.
